archimate:Node.name: Enterprise Service Bus
archimate:Node.documentation: Een systeem dat het vertalen en routeren van berichten ondersteunt.

properties.value: Talend ESB (http://www.talend.com/products/esb), Oracle Service Bus (http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/middleware/service-bus/overview/index.html), MuleSoft Mule ESB (http://www.mulesoft.org), RedHat JBoss SOA Platform (http://www.redhat.com/products/jbossenterprisemiddleware/soa/), IBM WebSphere ESB (http://www-03.ibm.com/software/products/us/en/wsesb/)
